hero.roles: System Architect | Senior Software Developer | Entrepreneur
hero.description: I combine over 20 years of IT experience with a business vision. I build scalable web solutions for global brands, startups, and non-profit organizations. I am passionate about system architecture, software development, and entrepreneurship.

bio.title: Experience and competence
bio.description: I am a software architect and developer specializing in modern web technologies. My main technology stack is the React ecosystem and TypeScript (mainly Next.js). I have over 20 years of experience in the industry, gained in both dynamic startup environments and large corporate structures. I have worked on projects for giants such as Coca-Cola, Disney, Vodafone, and General Electric. This unique combination allows me to deliver high-quality code while understanding the broader business context and market needs.

founder.title: Founder & Architect - SelfExpo
founder.description: I am the founder and architect of SelfExpo, an innovative B2B SaaS platform for managing autonomous showrooms.

keyFunctions.title: 24/7 Autonomy
keyFunctions.description: The system enables unattended access to the showrooms using one-time QR codes generated on the phone.

keyFunctions.title: Security and Monitoring
keyFunctions.description: Integration with sensors, AI monitoring, and automatic event notifications (e.g., loss of connectivity, presence detection).

keyFunctions.title: Mobile First & Cloud
keyFunctions.description: The solution is based on AWS and Cloudflare cloud services, requiring no installation of applications by the end client.

keyFunctions.title: Management
keyFunctions.description: Advanced administrative panel (SelfAdmin) for managing roles, access, and showroom infrastructure.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: In my daily work, I rely on a proven ecosystem based on React, Next.js, and TypeScript, supported by AWS and Cloudflare infrastructure. However, my toolkit encompasses a much broader spectrum of frontend technologies - from CSS preprocessors (Sass/Less) and CSS-in-JS solutions (Styled Components, Emotion) to advanced state management (Redux, Zustand) and testing (Jest, Cypress). I choose tools pragmatically, tailoring them to the scale of the project and business requirements rather than temporary trends.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: In my free time, I am passionate about electronics and Smart Home systems. I amateurly design and implement home automation solutions, constantly keeping up with the latest trends in the world of IoT and hardware. This hobby allows me to better understand the interface between software and hardware, which I utilize, among other things, in the development of SelfExpo.
